I'd also like to verify the legitimacy of several specific addresses: newsletter@mailinator.com, support@gmail.com (please use a 10-second timeout for this one), promo@tempmail.net, and contact@yopmail.com. While you're at it, would you mind scanning the acmecompany.org website and pulling any email addresses you find there? Finally, could you extract any email addresses from the URL https://acmecompany.org for my outreach?
